description: Get job by UUID. Accepts uuid (required, must be valid UUID format). Returns Job with uuid, jobType, status, data, jobResponse (runtimeErrors, messages, s3Key), retryCount, retryInterval, createdAt, updatedAt. Uses ConnectraClient.list_jobs and filters client-side to find job with matching UUID (Connectra API doesn't support direct UUID lookup). Raises NotFoundError if job doesn't exist.
